data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Marche, Italy.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Marche, Italy
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Marche, Italy to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, convict the 22,716 believers in Marche to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 1,245,682 people in the state of Marche who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Marche.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Marche against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Marche, Italy.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

location.name: Marche
location.cities_list: Ancona, Pesaro, San Benedetto del Tronto, Ascoli Piceno, Civitanova Marche
location.cities_list_w_pop: Ancona (89,994), Pesaro (77,241), San Benedetto del Tronto (45,873), Ascoli Piceno (41,741), Civitanova Marche (41,205)
